title: I Reincarnated Into a Vending Machine - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   Shounen   Supernatural
tags: Adapted to Anime   Business Management   Cooking   Dungeons   Game Elements   Male Protagonist   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Otaku   Reincarnated as an Object   Reincarnated in Another World   Sentient Objects   Sword And Magic
author: Hirukuma   昼熊
description: He, who was an authentic Vending Machine maniac, died from a traffic accident while protecting a vending machine. He, who had expected that his life was finished, woke up in a lake shore surrounded by abundant nature. He didn’t understand what had happened to himself. He only knew that he had become a vending machine. Alone in the labyrinth of another world… As he wanders alone, he meets a lone girl who causes the story to change.>
